column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were walk-ins from the area so we Â didn't expect to be seated right away
column2: but were willing to a seat at the bar downstairs . The bartender took forever to get to us
column3: then after we picked out our food and drinks
column4: we sat the menus down and waited a while again to be asked what we were going to order. The food was amazing
column5: one of the best steaks I've ever had
column6: we ordered the 22oz dry aged steak and the fried chicken
column7: as well as the baked goat cheese. Honestly
column8: my only complaint was the service
